StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetO.cerWaiverHistory]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NWAID int AS
SELECT W.OFFICER_WAIVER_ID, CONVERT(CHAR(11), W.WAIVER_SUBMIT_DATE, 106) AS WAIVER_SUBMIT_DATE, C.WAIVER_CATEGORY_DESC, T.WAIVER_TYPE_SHORT_DESC, WS.WAIVER_STATUS_DESC, T.WAIVER_LEVEL, T.WAIVER_CODE FROM OFFICER_WAIVER W INNER JOIN OFFICER_WAIVER_TYPE T ON (W.NWA_ID = @NWAID AND W.WAIVER_TYPE_ID = T.WAIVER_TYPE_ID) INNER JOIN OFFICER_WAIVER_CATEGORY C ON T.WAIVER_CATEGORY_ID = C.WAIVER_CATEGORY_ID INNER JOIN WAIVER_STATUS WS ON W.WAIVER_STATUS_CODE = WS.WAIVER_STATUS_CODE
